definition: distance measured by the time taken to cover it
details:
noun
- distance measured by the time taken to cover it
= example: distance measured by the time taken to cover it
= synonyms: minute
- a period of time equal to 1/24th of a day
= example: a period of time equal to 1/24th of a day
= synonyms: hr
- clock time
= example: clock time
= synonyms: time of day
- a special and memorable period
= example: a special and memorable period
